name: Senior Marketing Specialist
description:
Summary

Supports creation and/or execution of Russia marketing programs and campaigns associated with marketing strategies and plans

Actively engages in developing and executing marketing strategy for the respective countries in line with regional and global strategy working together with global and EMEA marketing teams daily

Reports to Russia Marketing Manager

Primary Responsibilities

  • Plans, develops or participates in regional marketing plans, responsibility assessments and timelines to support specific marketing activities, events and/or campaigns in accordance with SAS' sales and marketing initiatives for both internal and external clients/customers.
  • Is responsible for planning and execution of field marketing activities
  • Is accountable for the generation target as defined in the yearly business/marketing plan.
  • Is experienced in creating multi-channel go-to-market campaigns
  • Manages Programs, Campaigns and Activities in the supporting systems, in collaboration with the supporting Marketing Shared Services such as Marketing Sciences and Digital.
  • Works closely with Marketing Shared Services and other stakeholders (functional & technical experts, local CA, etc.) in order to maximize efficiency of the marketing mix within programs and campaigns.
  • Communicates about plans and results in an effective and consistent way to all stakeholders involved.
  • Advises SAS leadership, divisions and global staff (as relevant) on how to meet specific objectives via appropriate communications tools and channels.
  • Develops and maintains relationships and engagement with relevant constituents, which may include external media, influencers, employees, partners, customers and community members in order to deliver and publish key company messages and engage in dialogue.

Knowledge & Experience

  • Business administration/management/marketing degree and a minimum of 8 years of marketing experience with 5 years in a B-2-B field
  • Fluent in English
  • Excellent written, verbal, and visual communications skills, with the ability to communicate effectively with a wide variety of audiences
